Kodi muchiyesa choyenera,umo mukuti, Chilungamo changa chiposa cha Mulungu,
pakuti munena, Upindulanji nacho?Posachimwa ndinapindula chiyanichimene sindikadapindula pochimwa?
Yang'anani kumwamba, nimuone,tapenyani mitambo yokwera yakuposa inu.
Ngati mwachimwa, mumchitira Iye chiyani?Zikachuluka zolakwa zanu, mumchitira Iye chiyani?
Mukakhala wolungama, mumninkhapo chiyani?Kapena alandira chiyani pa dzanja lanu?
Choipa chanu chikhoza kuipira munthu wonga inu,ndi chilungamo chanu chikhoza kukomera wobadwa ndi munthu.
Chifukwa cha kuchuluka masautso anthu anafuula,afuula chifukwa cha dzanja la amphamvu.
Koma palibe anganene, Ali kuti Mulungu Mlengi wanga,wakupatsa nyimbo usiku;
wakutilangiza ife koposa nyama za padziko,wakutipatsa nzeru zoposa mbalame za m'mlengalenga?
Apo afuula, koma Iye sawayankha;chifukwa cha kudzikuza kwa anthu oipa.
Zedi Mulungu samvera zachabe,ndi Wamphamvuyonse sazisamalira.
Inde mungakhale munena, Sindimpenya,mlanduwo uli pamaso pake, ndipo mumlindira.
Ndipo tsopano popeza analibe kumzonda m'kukwiya kwake,ndi kusamalitsa cholakwa,
chifukwa chake Yobu anatsegula pakamwa pake mwachabe,nachulukitsa mau opanda nzeru.
